General.Name: Anhui Sun Create Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Sun Create Electronics Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and marketing of radar and security systems. It offers weather, air traffic control, and low-altitude warning radars, as well as related radar supporting parts; public safety products, such as safe city, emergency command communication, and intelligent transportation; electronic products; power products; mobile support equipment; and grain storage equipment. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hefei, China.
